title: Basboosa Semolina Cake
description: This is a This is a traditional Middle Eastern dessert made with semolina and yogurt then soaked in a rose water syrup.

title: Vanilla Chai Cookie
description: Crisp with a smooth inside. Rich vanilla pairs perfectly with its Chai partner a combination of cinnamon ands ginger and cloves. Can you think of a better way to have your coffee AND your Vanilla Chai in the morning?

title: Fudge Strip Cookie
description: Everyone needs to experience this one ' with the flavors of a soft baked cookie the 'fudge stripe' is our excuse for adding the perfect amount of rich decadent chocolate.

title: Animal Cupcake
description: Go wild and choose from a set of animal faces or one animal face printed on edible sugar paper.

title: Spiced Mexican Wedding Cookies
description: Beautifully round buttery pecan dotted cookies are rolled in sweet blizzard of snowy white powdered sugar and theyâ€™ll leave you savoring every tender bite.

title: Earl Grey Tea Cookies
description: These cookies are rather literal and Amelia Bedelia-esque in that they really contain tea leaves which are ground fine with the flour and give them a rich yet delicate flavor. With the buttery crunch of a sophisticated shortbread - these are dangerously addictive.

title: Malawian Sweet Potato Cookies
description: Malawi is a very poor country but the people are know for their hospitality and friendliness - it is known as the "Warm Heart of Africa". Tradition dictates cutting these Mbatata cookies into the shape of a heart.

title: Chinese Almond Cookies
description: Often served at festivals as well as New Year celebrations.

title: Corn Cookie
description: Maize represents vitality according to the native corn clans of the high Sonoran Desert in Arizona (Navaho and Hopi and Yaqui tribes et al.)

title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
description: Chewy sweet and crunchy on the outside.  These have made happy children for generations.
